citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
05-MAY-17.The APHIS Inspector spoke to the licensee at 2:30 PM. The licensee stated she was out of town and
there was no one available to conduct the inspection with.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
05-MAY-17.The APHIS Inspector spoke to the licensee at 2:30 PM. The licensee stated she was out of town and
there was no one available to conduct the inspection with.
